articles.author: RT
articles.title: Currency or commodity? 61% of bitcoin sitting dormant in wallets for over a year
articles.description: A whopping 61 percent of bitcoin has not been moved out of owners’ wallets in over a year, sparking debate on what the high figure means for the cryptocurrency, with some saying it is going through an identity crisis. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content:
June 28’s most upvoted Reddit post on bitcoin centered on the inactive nature of the cryptocurrency.
The post, which sources its information from blockchain data and intelligence provider Glassnode,… [+2110 chars]
